GeneDef.label: lesser super durability
GeneDef.description: Supers with this gene have skin that is somewhat durable, allowing them to resist various attacks.

GeneDef.label: greater super durability
GeneDef.description: Supers with this gene have skin that is more durable, allowing them to resist various attacks.

GeneDef.label: petty super healing
GeneDef.description: Heroes with this gene are a little hard to keep down due to how quickly their bodies recover from injuries.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Age takes a longer time to cause fertility issues, and never takes all fertility.

GeneDef.label: lesser super healing
GeneDef.description: Heroes with this gene are hard to keep down due to how quickly their bodies recover from injuries.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Age takes a longer time to cause fertility issues, and never takes all fertility.

GeneDef.label: greater super healing
GeneDef.description: Heroes with this gene are extremely hard to keep down due to how quickly their bodies recover from injuries.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Age takes a much longer time to cause fertility issues, and never takes all fertility.

GeneDef.label: lesser super intelligence
GeneDef.description: Supers with this gene have heightened intelligence that allows them to be far more efficient than most.

GeneDef.label: greater super intelligence
GeneDef.description: Supers with this gene have extreme intelligence that allows them to be far more efficient than most.

GeneDef.label: lesser super persuasion
GeneDef.description: Supers with this gene have an easier time bringing people over to their side.

GeneDef.label: greater super persuasion
GeneDef.description: Supers with this gene have an extremely easy time bringing people over to their side.

GeneDef.label: lesser super precision
GeneDef.description: Supers with this gene are capable of extraordinary feats of precision.

GeneDef.label: greater super precision
GeneDef.description: Supers with this gene are capable of feats of precision that are almost impossible to match.

GeneDef.label: petty super speed
GeneDef.description: Supers with this gene move a bit faster than normal pawns.

GeneDef.label: lesser super speed
GeneDef.description: Supers with this gene move faster than normal pawns.

GeneDef.label: greater super speed
GeneDef.description: Supers with this gene move far faster than normal pawns.

GeneDef.label: petty super strength
GeneDef.description: Supers with this gene can achieve notable feats of strength.

GeneDef.label: lesser super strength
GeneDef.description: Supers with this gene can achieve amazing feats of strength.

GeneDef.label: greater super strength
GeneDef.description: Supers with this gene can achieve incredible feats of strength.

GeneDef.label: grand super strength
GeneDef.description: Supers with this gene can achieve incredible feats of strength.

GeneDef.label: lesser antisuper durability
GeneDef.description: This super's skin is abnormally fragile, and receives lower benefits from sources of innate armor.

GeneDef.label: petty antisuper healing
GeneDef.description: This super heals slower than normal pawns.

GeneDef.label: lesser antisuper healing
GeneDef.description: This super heals slower than normal pawns.

GeneDef.label: greater antisuper healing
GeneDef.description: This super heals much slower than normal pawns.

GeneDef.label: lesser antisuper intelligence
GeneDef.description: Supers with this gene have smoother brains than normal pawns, making it more difficult for them to retain information.

GeneDef.label: lesser antisuper persuasion
GeneDef.description: Supers with this gene became slightly deformed due to their superhero gene, and their ability to speak has suffered as well.

GeneDef.label: greater antisuper persuasion
GeneDef.description: Supers with this gene became deformed due to their superhero gene, and their ability to speak has suffered as well.

GeneDef.label: lesser antisuper precision
GeneDef.description: Supers with this gene are clumsy, prone to dropping things while they work, and missing foes frequently when the super attacks.

GeneDef.label: greater antisuper precision
GeneDef.description: Supers with this gene are clumsy, prone to dropping things while they work, and missing foes frequently when the super attacks.

GeneDef.label: greater antisuper speed
GeneDef.description: Supers with this gene are slower than normal pawns.

GeneDef.label: lesser antisuper strength
GeneDef.description: This super is weaker than normal pawns.
